document.full_text: luis castillo, the former mets second baseman, failed a tryout with the phillies, who were looking for a fill-in for the injured chase utley.
document.title: castillo is cut by phillies, too
lines_and_colors: luis castillo, the former mets second baseman, failed a tryout with the phillies, who were looking for a fill-in for the injured chase utley.
